Package Description
uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.geometry  

  • Uses of LineSegment in uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.geometry

    Methods in uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.geometry with parameters of type LineSegment 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean EuclideanUtils.lineSegmentAndPolygonIntersect​(LineSegment lineSegment, com.mapbox.geojson.Polygon polygon)
    This method computes whether a given line segment and polygon intersect.
    static boolean EuclideanUtils.lineSegmentsIntersect​(LineSegment firstLine, LineSegment secondLine)
    This method determines whether two given line segments intersect.
    static boolean EuclideanUtils.pointOnSegmentInColinearTriplet​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point point, LineSegment lineSegment)
    Given a line segment from Point A to Point B, as well as a Point P, such that A,B, P are colinear, this function determines whether P lies on the given segment AB.
